titles.title: Lord Jesus Are We One With Thee

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord Jesus are we one with Thee O height O depth of love Thou one with us on Calvary We one with Thee above{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Such was Thy grace that for our sake Thou didst from heaven come down With us of flesh and blood partake In all our misery one{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Our sins our guilt in love Divine Confessed and borne by Thee The gall the curse the wrath were Thine To set Thy members free{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ascended now in glory bright Head of the Chruch Thou art Nor life nor death nor depth nor height Thy saints and Thee can part{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh teach us Lord to know and own This wonderous mystery That Thou in heaven with us art one And we are one with Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Soon soon shall come that glorious day When seated on Thy throne Thou shalt to wondering worlds display That Thou with us art one{/lang-eng}
